description: This file defines a React functional component 'GridCard' that renders a visual card with optional alignment demonstration and nested grid content. It imports constants from a utilities file and exports the component as default.

methods.name: GridCard({ title = "Card", subtitle = "Subtitle", index = 0, align = null, nested = false })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a customizable grid card with optional alignment and nested grid demos.
